function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?
Is it impossible for function 'func' to reach function 'main'?
Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'func'?
Is it impossible for function 'free' to reach function 'malloc'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i<n' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i<n' always executed?
Can the loop with condition '0' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition '0' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<n' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition '0' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'n (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'i (line 4)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'func'?
Is variable 'ret' live at the end of function 'func'?
dead_code: Can the program actually reach the statement: “int *p = NULL;”?
